name: rexn0
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
-| diffsw(s0, wne(c0, emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
-| diffsw(s0, wne(c0, emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(c0, emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| diffsw(s0, wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(c0, emptycls))

|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| diffsw(s0, wne(c0, emptycls))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wne(c0, emptycls))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, emptycls)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, emptycls)

|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Restricted existential quantification implies its restriction is nonempty. (Contributed by Szymon Jaroszewicz, 3-Apr-2007.)
